resources.string: Congratulations Your Request was Submitted Successfully,Once Approved You Will Receive Notification SMS
Qualify for instant loans up to KES. 100,000. Anywhere, anytime
Receive money to your phone directly in less than 24 hours
Best discounts on your loan repayments depending on the number of your referrals
Borrow with confidence, repay with much ease

Dear customer,
 Our company is committed to serving our customers based on trust and loyalty,it requires you to pay a customer commitment fee to our till number 452786 Till name BOB STUDIOS LTD procedure 
 1. Go to Mpesa 
 2. Buy goods and services 
 3. Enter till number 452786
 4. Enter amount
 5. Enter pin 
 6. Wait for confirmation message
